mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PROJECTNAME, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS from DB_PROJECTBBS where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
